director.name: 罗伯特·H·利勃曼 Robert H. Lieberman

playdate: 2017-06-14(澳大利亚/加拿大/英国/新西兰)
this_title: Angkor Awakens: A Portrait of Cambodia
introduction: Cambodia is a nation split between a bright future and a black past, still tending the savage wounds wrought upon its people by the Khmer Rouge and the USA bombers whilst also cultivating a determined and optimistic new generation. This deep and incisive portrait of a vibrant, bustling country moves beyond the verdant hills, ancient wonders and modern metropolises to reveal a past of violence and pain which still lingers not too far below the surface.
chinese_title: Angkor Awakens: A Portrait of Cambodia
